hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT o.EOOR_LOGISTIC_NO, o.EDIERRINFO, o.EOOR_REMARK, o.EOOR_CUSTOMER_CODE, o.EOOR_CUSTOMER_NAME, o.EOOR_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, o.EOOR_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, o.EOOR_SHIP_INV_CODE, o.EOOR_SHIP_INV_NAME, o.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_INV_CODE, o.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_INV_NAME, i.EOOI_CODE, i.EOOI_NAME, i.EOOI_QUANTITY, i.EOOI_VOLUME, i.EOOI_GROSS_WEIGHT, i.EOOI_PRICE, i.EOOI_REMARK, i.EOOI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, i.EOOI_ITEM_DESC, i.ITEM_LENGTH, i.ITEM_WIDTH, i.ITEM_HEIGHT FROM MID_EO_ORDER_B2B o INNER JOIN MID_EO_ORDER_B2B_ITEM i on o.EDI_TRANS_ID = i.EDI_TRANS_ID where 1=1 << AND o.EDI_TRANS_ID in (:ediTransIds) >> order by o.CREATE_TIME
